definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: bitter thing, gall, poison; cstr. [[מְרוֹרַת]] Job 20:14; sf. [[מְרׂרָתוֹ]] v:Job 20:25; pl. [[מְרׂרׂת]] De 32:32, [[מְרׂרוֹת]] Job 13:36; —
gall, i.e. seat of gall, gall-bladder Job 20:25 (‖[[גֵּוׇה]] back; cf. [[מְרֵרָה]] 16:30).
[[מְרׂרוֹת]] bitter thing Job 13:26 (of God's edict of judgment).
pl. abstr. = bitterness; [[אַשְׁכְּלֽת]] ´[[מ]] De 32:32 clusters of bitterness (‖[[עִנְּבְי רוֹשׁ]]).
